item.title: Get pretty org-bullets in Doom Emacs
item.description: When installing Doom Emacs and using org-mode the defaults bullets are `*`. In order to get some fancy bullets the following steps need to be taken. Add the org-mode +pretty flag to your org settings in init.el To read more on the available flags check the org-mode Doom Emacs module `lang/org` :lang (org +pretty ) ; organize your plain life in plain text (setq org-superstar-headline-bullets-list '("⁖" "◉" "○" "✸" "✿") )
